## Conversion.BaseConverter.withFormattedError() method

Creates a new [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) which is derived from this one but which returns an error message formatted by the supplied formatter if the conversion fails.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withFormattedError(formatter: ConversionErrorFormatter<TC>): Converter<T, TC>;
```

formatter


</td><td>

[ConversionErrorFormatter](./ts-utils.conversion.conversionerrorformatter.md)<!-- -->&lt;TC&gt;


</td><td>

The formatter to be applied.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TC&gt;

A new [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) returning `<T>`<!-- -->.
